Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Requires the chancellor of the NYC department of education to establish a pilot program for the purpose of providing frozen take-home meals to certain children located in the city of New York
Summary: Requires the chancellor of the NYC department of education to establish a pilot program for the purpose of providing frozen take-home meals to certain children located in the city of New York; requires the chancellor of the NYC department of education to select one NYC public school from each borough to participate in such pilot program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the New York city school lunch leftover take-home meal pilot program
